faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I add a new plant?
faq.a1: Open the menu and tap the 'Add plant' button. Then fill in your plant's details.
faq.q2: Can I set custom watering schedules?
faq.a2: Yes! Each plant has its own customizable watering schedule. You can adjust it anytime based on your plant's needs.
faq.a3: Our app sends push notifications to your device. Make sure notifications are enabled in your phone settings.
faq.a4: Your data is securely stored in our encrypted database. We use Firebase Authentication for secure access.
faq.q5: Can I share my plants with family?
faq.a5: Currently, each user has their own garden. We're working on multi-user features for the future!
faq.a6: Yes! Water Me is completely free to download and use.
faq.a7: Yes. The app is fully open source and we only store the minimum data needed to make it work.
